Guard your search experience with secure technology that search in the fastest, most efficient and effective way in your online browsing. Download "Guard Search" now and turn your ensures convenient default search results: explore topics, images, videos, and news without leaving your start page provided by Microsoft Bing.

By clicking “Add to Chrome”, I accept the EULA and Privacy Policy of "Guard Search" and consent to install it to my Chrome Browser as default search. The extension will update your search settings and will change your Default search services to Microsoft Bing.

This extension is free to download from the Chrome Web store, and you can uninstall it at any time.

Imagine every online session becoming a true pleasure, not just a routine internet search. With the "Guard Search" extension for Google Chrome, this is now possible!

With "Guard Search", there's no need to spend time on boring queries and endless scrolling through search results. Our extension has the unique ability to tailor queries specifically to your needs.
We collaborate with Bing to offer you convenient internet search. "Guard Search"  will provide you with convenient search results by default from Microsoft Bing.

Forget about the worry and stress of searching for information online – trust "Guard Search" and enjoy simple and efficient information retrieval. Simplifying your online life and making it more enjoyable is very simple. "Guard Search" is just the first step!
